meanings.definition: A group of people or animals considered superior to others in a particular characteristic or ability.
meanings.sent1: The superraces of cheetahs are known for their incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: The horse won the race, proving its place among the superraces of the track.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel joked that the superraces of the forest must be the birds with their ability to fly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, the ants are the superraces, always working together efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The superraces of the ocean are the dolphins, known for their intelligence and agility.

meanings.definition: To classify or categorize into different levels of superiority based on certain criteria.
meanings.sent1: Scientists superrace animals based on their habitats and behaviors.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will superrace the students' projects to determine the winners.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly superraced the vegetables, declaring the carrots as the superraces of the salad.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, the judges will superrace the dancers to select the best performer.
meanings.sent5: The coach will superrace the players to form the strongest team for the match.
